title: Real-Time Asset Monitoring Dashboard
description: A control room operator uses a dashboard to monitor the real-time status and performance of a diverse portfolio of renewable assets.

tasks.description: Display the current power output (in MW) for each wind farm, solar farm, and battery system in the portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dashboard shows live generation data for all assets.

tasks.description: Highlight any assets that are currently offline or operating under a fault condition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dashboard clearly flags two assets with active, non-critical faults.

tasks.description: Show the current market price of electricity in the regions where the assets are located.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dashboard displays live LMP data next to the relevant assets.
